Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class TurnController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.TurnController
public class TurnController
extends java.lang.Object
This class handles the turn logic in the game, advancing the active player when an End Turn action has been received by the active client. Note that this class also keeps track of the connection statuses of all players: this is because the game skips a player's turn when the player's client is disconnected from the server.

    • advanceTurn

      public void advanceTurn()
      This class lives for this method Method to be called whenever an EndTurn request is received by the active player : this method is to be called from the Game class, after having checked that the request was received by the active player.

    • forceAdvanceTurn

      public boolean forceAdvanceTurn​(java.lang.String _nickname)
      Method to force a turn advance when the active player gets disconnected
      Parameters:
      _nickname - the nickname of the disconnected player. Must be activePlayer's nickname to trigger advanceTurn()

    • isActivePlayer

      boolean isActivePlayer​(PlayerBoard _player)
      Method to check whether the PlayerBoard passed as an argument is the active board or not
      Parameters:
      _player - PlayerBoard to be checked
      Returns:
      true if _player is activePlayer, false otherwise

    • isPlayerConnected

      boolean isPlayerConnected​(PlayerBoard _board)
      Overloaded method Getter for a specified PlayerBoard's connection status.
      Parameters:
      _board - PlayerBoard whose status is of interest.
      Returns:
      true if the corresponding client is connected, false otherwise.

    • isPlayerConnected

      boolean isPlayerConnected​(java.lang.String _nickname)
      Overloaded method Getter for a specified player's connection status.
      Parameters:
      _nickname - Player's nickname whose status is of interest.
      Returns:
      true if the corresponding client is connected, false otherwise.

    • setPlayerConnection

      Overloaded method Setter for a specified PlayerBoard's connection status.
      Parameters:
      _board - PlayerBoard whose status is to be set.
      _newStatus - New connection status, either true or false.
